triplets: Human being, a member of the species Homo sapiens
Living, working, social interaction, creativity, reproduction, and contributing to society
Biological tissues, bones, organs, and cells
Head, torso, limbs, brain, heart, and sensory organs
Varied skin tones, hair colors, and eye colors depending on genetics and ethnicity
Family, community, society, and human civilization
Not manufactured; born through biological reproduction
Approximately 50–100 kg on average, varying widely
Approximately 1.5–1.9 meters on average, varying globally
Approximately 70–80 years on average, depending on region and lifestyle
